UNICRON:


Unicron was realy annoyed he has been defeated once and once aga=
in, and he was feed up of it. After a Large Meditating plan he  decided to =
run it. He had noticed that a large mount of Energon was in that planet, an=
d that affects his troop develop; then... the nergon would have to to dissa=
pear !!!!!

Using a massive amount of energy, the Huge Trasformer shot a di=
schage to a Energon pile in Earth. That did that it exploted and... Started=
 a Chainged reaction!!!!!! Explotion after explotion!! All Planet was afect=
ed and started a Massive clataclism... Tsunamis and Earthquakes was strikin=
g merciless the planet and it didnt' stopped, it seemed that the planet sta=
rted to collapse and a massive Energon's Wave strike all Planet hitting all=
 bots in. After that.... Silence. 

Unicron lookjed the destruction that he=
 had caused and grinned, still was in that planet alot Enrgon for him and h=
is troops; with the help of drones,  he set all his minions ind special pod=
s and trown them towards Earth and Moon. When time comes, it would be with =
few energon in planet, them would awake... and will help to take down the p=
lanet for him.

After that, the huge Trasformer retreat until his time come=
s.
